trans-unit.source: Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0

trans-unit.source: Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Instalar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to install the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico explica como instalar o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] is designed to be backwards compatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] é projetado para serem compatíveis com versões anteriores do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] run unchanged in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets, provedores, snap-ins, módulos e scripts desenvolvidos para o [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] são executados sem alterações no [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, Windows PowerShell host programs that were written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in later releases of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, devido a uma alteração na política de ativação do tempo de execução no Microsoft .NET Framework 4, programas de host do Windows PowerShell que foram desenvolvidos para [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] e compilados com o CLR (Common Language Runtime) 2.0 não podem ser executado sem modificação em versões posteriores do [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], que é compilado com o CLR 4.0.

trans-unit.source: To maintain backward compatibility with commands and host programs that are affected by these changes, the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] engines are designed to run side\-by\-side.
trans-unit.target: Para manter a compatibilidade com versões anteriores com comandos e programas de host são afetados por essas alterações, os Mecanismos do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] são projetados para execução lado a lado.

trans-unit.source: Also, the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está incluído no [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is intended to be used only when an existing script or host program cannot run because it is incompatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], or Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: O Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] se destina a ser usado somente quando um programa de host ou um script existente não puder ser executado porque ele é incompatível com [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] ou Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: Such cases are expected to be rare.
trans-unit.target: Tais casos devem ser raros.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is an optional feature of [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_1](../Token/win8_client_1_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_1](../Token/win8_server_1_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] é um recurso opcional do [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_1](../Token/win8_client_1_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_server_1](../Token/win8_server_1_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: On earlier versions of Windows, when you install [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] installation completely replaces the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] installation in the [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] installation directory.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do Windows, quando você instala o [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)], a instalação do [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] substitui completamente a do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] no diretório de instalação do [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is retained.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] é mantido.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine feature is turned on by default.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], o recurso do Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] é ativado por padrão.

trans-unit.source: However, to use it, you need to turn on the option for Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5, which it requires.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, para usá-lo, você precisa ativar a opção para Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5, que ele exige.

trans-unit.source: This section also explains how to turn the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine feature on and off.
trans-unit.target: Esta seção também explica como ativar e desativar o recurso do Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To turn on .NET Framework 3.5
trans-unit.target: Para ativar o .NET Framework 3.5

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows Features**.
trans-unit.target: Na tela **Iniciar**, clique em **Recursos do Windows**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Apps** bar, click **Settings**, and then click **Turn Windows features on or off**.
trans-unit.target: Em **Aplicativos**, clique em **Configurações** e em **Ativar ou desativar recursos do Windows**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Windows Features** box, click **.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0** to select it.
trans-unit.target: Na caixa **Recursos do Windows**, clique em **.NET Framework 3.5 (inclui o .NET 2.0 e 3.0** para selecioná-la.

trans-unit.source: When you select **.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0**, the box fills to indicate that only part of the feature is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando você seleciona **.NET Framework 3.5 (inclui o .NET 2.0 e 3.0**, a caixa é preenchida para indicar que apenas parte do recurso está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: However, this is sufficient for the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, isso é suficiente para o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To turn the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine on and off
trans-unit.target: Para ativar e desativar o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: On the **Start** screen, type **Windows Features**.
trans-unit.target: Na tela **Iniciar**, clique em **Recursos do Windows**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Apps** bar, click **Settings**, and then click **Turn Windows features on or off**.
trans-unit.target: Em **Aplicativos**, clique em **Configurações** e em **Ativar ou desativar recursos do Windows**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Windows Features** box, expand the **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]** node, and click the **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine** box to select or clear it.
trans-unit.target: Na caixa **Recursos do Windows**, expanda o **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]** nó e clique na caixa **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Mecanismo** para marcá-la ou desmarcá-la.

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedures to add the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine and Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 features.
trans-unit.target: Use os procedimentos a seguir para adicionar os recursos Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] e Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: O Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] requer o Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 no mínimo.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito é atendido pelo Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.

trans-unit.source: To add the .NET Framework 3.5 feature
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar o recurso .NET Framework 3.5

trans-unit.source: In **Server Manager**, from the **Manage** menu, select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: Em **Gerenciador do Servidor**, no menu **Gerenciar** clique em **Adicionar Funções e Recursos**.

trans-unit.source: Or in **Server Manager**, click **All Servers**, right\-click a server name, and then select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: Ou então, no **Gerenciador do Servidor**, clique em **Todos os Servidores**, clique com o botão direito do mouse em um nome do servidor e selecione **Adicionar Funções e Recursos**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Installation Type** page, select **Role\-based or feature\-based installation**.
trans-unit.target: Na página **Tipo de Instalação**, selecione **Instalação baseada em função ou em recurso**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Features** page, expand the **.NET 3.5 Framework Features** node and select **.NET Framework 3.5 (includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0)**.
trans-unit.target: Sobre a página **Recursos**, expanda o nó **Recursos do .NET 3.5 Framework** e selecione **.NET Framework 3.5 (inclui .NET 2.0 e 3.0)**.

trans-unit.source: The other options under that node are not required for the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: As outras opções sob aquele nó não são necessárias para o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To add the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine feature
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar o recurso do Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: In **Server Manager**, from the **Manage** menu, select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: Em **Gerenciador do Servidor**, no menu **Gerenciar** clique em **Adicionar Funções e Recursos**.

trans-unit.source: Or **Server Manager**, click **All Servers**, right\-click a server name, and then select **Add Roles and Features**.
trans-unit.target: Ou então, no **Gerenciador do Servidor**, clique em **Todos os Servidores**, clique com o botão direito do mouse em um nome do servidor e selecione **Adicionar Funções e Recursos**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Installation Type** page, select **Role\-based or feature\-based installation**.
trans-unit.target: Na página **Tipo de Instalação**, selecione **Instalação baseada em função ou em recurso**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Features** page, expand the **[!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] (Installed)** node and select **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine**.
trans-unit.target: Na página **Recursos**, expanda o nó **[!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] (Instalado)** e selecione **[!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Mecanismo**.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: On Earlier Systems
trans-unit.target: Em sistemas anteriores

trans-unit.source: The [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881) package that installs [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], includes the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: O pacote do [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881) que instala o [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] em [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] inclui o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is enabled and ready to use, if necessary, without additional installation, setup, or configuration.
trans-unit.target: O Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está habilitado e pronto para usar, se necessário, sem instalação, configuração ou definições adicionais.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] package that installs [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], includes the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine.
trans-unit.target: O pacote do [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] que instala o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] em [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] inclui o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] Engine is enabled and ready to use, if necessary, without additional installation, setup, or configuration.
trans-unit.target: O Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] está habilitado e pronto para usar, se necessário, sem instalação, configuração ou definições adicionais.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Consulte Também

trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.target: Instalar o Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.target: Iniciando o Windows PowerShell [ps]

trans-unit.source: Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine
trans-unit.target: Iniciando o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0
